title: Alternating optimization with {ao}
text: Alternating optimization iterative procedure optimizing function jointly parameters alternating restricted optimization individual parameter subsets. precisely, consider minimizing maximizing \(f:\mathbb{R}^n \\mathbb{R}\) set feasible points \(x \X \subseteq \mathbb{R}^n\). underlying algorithm alternating optimization follows: Assign initial value \(x\). Optimize \(f\) respect subset parameters \(\tilde{x}\) holding parameters constant. (Note alternating optimization generalization joint optimization, parameter subset whole set parameters.) Replace values \(x\) optimal values \(\tilde{x}\) found step 2. Repeat step 2 another parameter subset. Stop process converged reached iteration limit.

what: When is alternating optimization a good idea?
title: Alternating optimization with {ao}
text: joint optimization (numerically) difficult (feasible). natural division parameters. case, e.g., likelihood functions, parameter space naturally divides parameter subsets corresponding linear effects, variances covariances different influence likelihood value. improve optimization time cases, see (Hu Hathaway 2002) example. Compared joint optimization, alternating optimization may better bypassing local optima, see (James C. Bezdek Hathaway 2002).

what: What are the properties of alternating optimization?
title: Alternating optimization with {ao}
text: Alternating optimization (certain conditions \(f\)) can convergence global optimum. However, set possible solutions also contains saddle points (James C. Bezdek et al. 1987). J. Bezdek Hathaway (2003) shows alternating optimization reasonable assumptions locally \(q\)-linearly convergent.

title: Alternating optimization with {ao}

Parameter indices can members multiple subsets. base_optimizer: object class optimizer, can specified via optimizeR::set_optimizer(). default optimizer stats::optim(). iterations: number iterations partitions. default 10. tolerance: non-negative numeric value. function terminates prematurely euclidean distance current solution one last iteration smaller tolerance. default 1e-6. 0 (default): printing 1: initial final details printed 2: full tracing information printed plot: TRUE, parameter updates plotted. default FALSE.
